item.title: Fed faces ‘ghost’ jobs shock before key interest-rate-cut decision
item.description: Q1 job revisions could prompt faster Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.

item.title: JPMorgan warns of possible market pullback as Fed cut looms
item.description: "Bad news is good news" is an ugly mantra for Wall Street

item.title: Amazon is selling a $200 electric leaf blower for $100 that's 'powerful, convenient, and reliable'
item.description: "This blower is a beast for its size; it's lightweight but packs serious power."

item.title: Amtrak denies helping Trump take credit for Biden-era train projects
item.description: New signs have popped up across the country at projects funded by the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act.

item.title: Frontier Airlines' change makes flying even less pleasant
item.description: Frontier Airlines is going to make flying more miserable for passengers with a strategy it claims increases efficiency.
